title: Forgot to recite Takbeer in Salah, should I make sujood as sahu? - Sheikh Assimalhakeem
transcript: finally if someone forgets to recite takbir in between the Salah is it obligatory for her or him to do such the so the answer is yes this is one of the mandatory acts of salat you forget it you must offer it there is a Sudha who in order to compensate for it
